MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G78 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:45pm to safely complete repairs on faulty equipment near Waterside Mill substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:48pm on Tuesday, 13 April 2021
